00039     static const int32_t WEF_NULL                    = 0x00000000;
00040     static const int32_t WEF_NO_WARNING_ERROR        = 0x00000000;
00041     static const int32_t WEF_RESERVED_0              = 0x00000001;
00042     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_1          = 0x00000002;
00043     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_2          = 0x00000004;
00044     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_3          = 0x00000008;
00045     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_4          = 0x00000010;
00046     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_5          = 0x00000020;
00047     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_6          = 0x00000040;
00048     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_7          = 0x00000080;
00049     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_8          = 0x00000100;
00050     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_9          = 0x00000200;
00051     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_10         = 0x00000400;
00052     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_11         = 0x00000800;
00053     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_12         = 0x00001000;
00054     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_13         = 0x00002000;
00055     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_14         = 0x00004000;
00056     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_15         = 0x00008000;
00057     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_16         = 0x00010000;
00058     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_17         = 0x00020000;
00059     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_18         = 0x00040000;
00060     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_19         = 0x00080000;
00061     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_20         = 0x00100000;
00062     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_21         = 0x00200000;
00063     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_22         = 0x00400000;
00064     static const int32_t WEF_USER_DEFINED_23         = 0x00800000;
00065     static const int32_t WEF_RESERVED_24             = 0x01000000;
00066     static const int32_t TIMESTAMP_PROBLEM           = 0x02000000;
00067     static const int32_t PARAM_INVALID               = 0x04000000;
00068     static const int32_t PARAM_UNSUPPORTED_PRECISION = 0x08000000;
00069     static const int32_t PARAM_OUT_OF_RANGE          = 0x10000000;

00071     static const int32_t HARDWARE_DEVICE_FAILURE     = 0x40000000;
00072     static const int32_t FIELD_NOT_EXECUTED          = 0x80000000;

00084   // Constant to use in place of CIF# for getting offset to Free-form Warning/Error message
00085   static const int8_t FREE_FORM_MESSAGE = (int8_t) 0xFF; // (int8_t) 0xFF == -1
00086 
00088   typedef struct FreeFormMessage {
00090     FreeFormMessage () : bbuf(0) {
00091     }
00098     FreeFormMessage (const std::string msg) : 
00099           bbuf(msg.size()+1) { // one extra for null terminator
00100       if (msg.size()==0) {
00101         bbuf.resize(0);
00102       } else {
00103         memcpy(&bbuf[0], &msg[0], msg.size());
00104         bbuf[msg.size()] = '\0';
00105       }
00106     }
00115     FreeFormMessage (const char* msg, const size_t len) : bbuf(len) {
00116       memcpy(&bbuf[0], msg, len);
00117     }
00124     void setMessage (const std::string msg) {
00125       if (msg.size()==0) {
00126         bbuf.resize(0);
00127       } else {
00128         bbuf.resize(msg.size()+1); // one extra for null terminator
00129         memcpy(&bbuf[0], &msg[0], msg.size());
00130         bbuf[msg.size()] = '\0';
00131       }
00132     }
00140     void setMessage (const char* msg, const size_t len) {
00141       bbuf.resize(len);
00142       memcpy(&bbuf[0], msg, len);
00143     }
00152     std::string text () const {
00153       if (bbuf.size() == 0) { // no/empty message
00154         return "";
00155       } else if (bbuf[bbuf.size()-1] == '\0') { // null terminated c-string
00156         return std::string((char*) &bbuf[0]);
00157       } else { // non null terminated char array
00158         return std::string((char*) &bbuf[0], bbuf.size());
00159       }
00160     }
00170     const char* buffer () const {
00171       return &bbuf[0];
00172     }
00176     size_t size () const {
00177       return bbuf.size();
00178     }
00182     bool empty () const {
00183       return bbuf.size()==0;
00184     }
00185     std::vector<char> bbuf; 
00186   } FreeFormMessage_t;

00372       UNUSED_VARIABLE(cifNum); UNUSED_VARIABLE(bit); UNUSED_VARIABLE(xoff); UNUSED_VARIABLE(cif7bit);
00373       throw VRTException("All Warn/Error fields are 32 bits; BasicAcknowledgePacket only supports getL.");
00374     }

00378     }

00483 
00484     protected: inline bool isCIFEnable (int8_t cifNum) const {
00485       bool occurrence = cifNum&0x08; // false for warn / true for error
00486       switch(cifNum&0xF7) { // Ignore bit 3 (occurrence)
00487         case 0:
00488           if ((!occurrence && getWarningsGenerated()) || (occurrence && getErrorsGenerated()))
00489             return true;
00490           else
00491             return false;
00492         case 1: return isCIF1Enable(cifNum&0x08);
00493         case 2: return isCIF2Enable(cifNum&0x08);
00494         case 3: return isCIF3Enable(cifNum&0x08);
00495         case 7: return isCIF7Enable(cifNum&0x08);
00496         default:
00497           throw VRTException("Invalid Context Indicator Field number.");
00498       }
00499     }

00526     // Warning Indicator Fields
00527     protected: int32_t getWarningIndicatorField (int8_t wifNum) const {
00528       return getContextIndicatorField(wifNum);
00529     }

00532     }

00534       return getContextIndicatorFieldBit(field);
00535     }

00537     // Error Indicator Fields
00538     protected: int32_t getErrorIndicatorField (int8_t eifNum) const {
00539       return getContextIndicatorField(eifNum | 0x8);
00540     }
00541     protected: int32_t getErrorIndicatorField (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field) const {
00542       return getContextIndicatorField(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8);
00543     }
00544     protected: boolNull getErrorIndicatorFieldBit (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field) const {
00545       return getContextIndicatorFieldBit(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field));
00546     }

00548     // Warning Fields
00549 
00556     public: int32_t getWarning (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) const {
00557       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00558       return getL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00559     }
00560 
00567     public: void setWarning (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00568       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00569       setL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), val, cif7bit);
00570     }
00571     
00578     public: void addWarning (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00579       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00580       if (val == WEF_NULL) return;
00581       int32_t bits = getL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00582       setL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), val | bits, cif7bit);
00583     }
00584 
00592     public: void removeWarning (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00593       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00594       if (val == WEF_NULL) return;
00595       int32_t bits = getL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00596       setL(getCIFNumber(field), getCIFBitMask(field), ~val & bits, cif7bit);
00597     }
00598 
00602     public: std::vector<WarningErrorField_t> getWarnings () const;

00604     // Error Fields

00613     public: int32_t getError (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) const {
00614       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00615       return getL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00616     }
00617 
00624     public: void setError (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL){
00625       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00626       setL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), val, cif7bit);
00627     }
00628     
00635     public: void addError (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00636       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00637       if (val == WEF_NULL) return;
00638       int32_t bits = getL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00639       setL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), val | bits, cif7bit);
00640     }
00641 
00649     public: void removeError (IndicatorFieldEnum_t field, int32_t val, IndicatorFieldEnum_t cif7field=CIF_NULL) {
00650       int32_t cif7bit = (getCIFNumber(cif7field) != 7) ? 0 : getCIFBitMask(cif7field);
00651       if (val == WEF_NULL) return;
00652       int32_t bits = getL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), cif7bit);
00653       setL(getCIFNumber(field) | 0x8, getCIFBitMask(field), ~val & bits, cif7bit);
00654     }
00655 
00659     public: std::vector<WarningErrorField_t> getErrors () const;
00660 
00664     public: bool hasFreeFormMessage () const;
00665 
00669     public: FreeFormMessage_t getFreeFormMessage () const;
00670 
00674     public: void setFreeFormMessage (const FreeFormMessage_t msg);
00675

00683     public: virtual Value*    getField      (int32_t id) const __attribute__((warn_unused_result));
00684     public: virtual void      setField      (int32_t id, const Value* val);
00685     */

00687   }; /*  BasicAcknowledgePacket */
